articles.title: Why ‘hold forever’ investors are snapping up venture capital ‘zombies’
articles.description: An investor explains the "buy, fix, and hold" model employed by Bending Spoons and similar companies that buy distressed startups.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: YouTube is working on a feature that will fix the messy home feed
articles.description: YouTube is experimenting with a new feature that allows users to customize their home feed.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Character AI will offer interactive ‘Stories’ to kids instead of open-ended chat
articles.description: The company announced last month that it would no longer allow minors to use its chat features.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: ChatGPT’s voice mode is no longer a separate interface
articles.description: ChatGPT now lets you use voice and text in the same screen, making conversations feel more natural as responses and visuals appear in real time.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Warner Music signs deal with AI music startup Suno, settles lawsuit
articles.description: WMG says artists and songwriters will have full control over whether and how their names, images, likenesses, voices, and compositions are used in
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: OpenAI and Perplexity are launching AI shopping assistants, but competing startups aren’t sweating it
articles.description: Startup founders building AI shopping tools think general-purpose models are too broad to deliver truly personalized shopping experiences.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Find Your Grind raises $5M to grow platform empowering students to explore unique career paths
articles.description: Nick Gross says that Find Your Grind gives students the tools to explore what careers are out there and what paths suit their strengths, interests,
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Microsoft’s AI chatbot Copilot leaves WhatsApp on January 15
articles.description: WhatsApp's new platform policies ban general-purpose AI chatbots like Copilot from using its service.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: China’s Pony AI plans to triple global robotaxi fleet by the end of 2026
articles.description: The Chinese autonomous vehicle company Pony.ai has global ambitions and plans to build a 3,000-strong robotaxi fleet to meet them.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Fleet Space finds massive lithium deposit using AI and satellites
articles.description: The discovery suggests that a region in Quebec might hold even more lithium than originally suspected.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Speechify adds voice typing and voice assistant to its Chrome extension
articles.description: In the last 12 months, there has been a proliferation of voice detection tools, thanks to overall quality improvement in speech recognition models.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Spotify to raise US prices in first quarter of next year, report says
articles.description: Major record labels have been urging Spotify and other music streaming platforms to raise subscription prices, arguing that fees have not kept pace
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: India’s gig workers win legal status, but access to social security remains elusive
articles.description: India is restructuring its gig economy with a new labor law, but much more is needed before gig workers see real benefits.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Google teams up with Accel to hunt for India’s next AI breakouts
articles.description: Google and Accel will jointly invest up to $2 million in each startup through their new partnership.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
